==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{audio|de|De-Türkei.ogg|Audio}} * {{rhymes|de|aɪ̯}} ===Proper noun=== {{de-proper noun|f}} # [[Turkey]] {{gloss|country}} ====Usage notes==== Unlike most German names of countries (which are usually neuter), {{lang|de|''Türkei''}} is feminine and takes the definite article {{m|de|die}}. * {{ux|de|'''Die Türkei''' befindet sich sowohl in Asien als auch in Europa.|Turkey is located in both Asia and Europe.}} * {{ux|de|Viele Bewohner Deutschlands stammen aus '''der Türkei'''.|Lots of residents of Germany are from Turkey.}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|türkeistämmig}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|türkisch}} * {{l|de|Turkmenistan}} * {{l|de|Turkvolk}} * {{l|de|Türke}} ** {{l|de|Kümmeltürke}} {{qualifier|derogative}} ====See also==== * {{l|de|osmanisches Reich}}, {{l|de|Osmanisches Reich}} [[Category:German words suffixed with -ei]] {{topics|de|Countries in Asia|Countries in Europe}}
